s0118: I have state grave lord, Si Tu, Si Ma, Si Kong, Ya Lu, Shi Shi, thousand husband long, hundred husband long, and Yong, Shu, Qiang, Mao, Wei, Lu, Peng, Pu people, raise your spear, compare your shield, stand your spear, I will oath.'
s0125: Still strong strong, like tiger like Xiong, like wolf like Li, at Shang suburbs, not resist conquer flee, to serve west earth, encourage master!
s0127: Oath already, feudal lords troops meet chariots four thousand ascend, arrange troops Mu Ye.
s0134: Wu Wang hold big white flag to wave feudal lords, feudal lords complete bow Wu Wang, Wu Wang then bow feudal lords, feudal lords complete follow.
s0141: Wu Wang again shoot three send, strike with sword, cut with Xuan Yue, hang his head small white flag.
s0142: Wu Wang already then exit recover army.
s0149: Yin Yi Xi Zhu said: 'Yin end grandson Ji Zhou, exhaust waste previous wang bright virtue, insult despise spirit god not sacrifice, muddle violent Shang Yi hundred surnames, its chapter bright hear at heaven emperor god.'
